Topic.Title: Welcome to the new Chat forum!

Posts.EditableText:
I've split the old "Games and Chat" forum into two separate forums. This "Chat" forum contains all the posts from old "Games and Chat" forum.

[b:3efzr14r]What this forum is for[/b:3efzr14r]

General chat and discussion about anything not related to Quest.

[b:3efzr14r]What this forum is NOT for[/b:3efzr14r]

Please post anything that IS related to Quest to one of the other forums.

[b:3efzr14r]Moderators[/b:3efzr14r]

Moderators shall lock any "flamewar" threads to avoid long and pointless bickering matches. They must also post a message to the thread saying that they have locked it.

Moderators shall delete posts only if they are obviously spam or contain offensive material. Otherwise the thread should just be locked.
